content.question: In the final sentence of the third paragraph, the clause “although we do control the conditions of observation” functions as a transitional element that

choices.label: explains the role of observation in scientific work
refutes a claim regarding the status of astronomy among the sciences
suggests that the definition of “experiment” has changed over time
clarifies the reasons astronomy meets the standards for scientific rigor

content.answer: clarifies the reasons astronomy meets the standards for scientific rigor
